string.text: Get the artifact.
Protect the stalkers' camp at the Garbage from bandits' assault
Protect the stalkers' camp at the Garbage from bandits' assault

A group of stalkers is coming to visit me, and I am personally interested in their safe arrival. They'll stay not far from the Bar. One penitent criminal element almost voluntary informed us that they are going to be attacked soon. So, head in that direction and protect their camp from the assault.
Help stalkers fight off the bandits at Agroprom
Help stalkers fight off the bandits at Agroprom

So here's the deal. Recently a group of stalkers went to Agroprom. The last time they contacted, they said that there was something valuable in the underground, but they were pressed hard by the badits. They're holding on, but they can't clear out. Will you help them out?
Eliminate the bandits in the Marshes.
Wipe out the bandit gang that settled in the Marshes. It has to be a quick and efficient operation.

A job, eh? Let’s see what we’ve got... Aha! Here you go: can you knock out that pack of bandits in the Marshes? The Duty, with all their speeches about law and order, just can’t get down to it. Those are some rare scumbags, so they won't last long anyway. But the guy who gets them first will score big... and the booze is on me, of course.
Eliminate the Mercs and bandits in the Forest Thicket.
Destroy the group of Mercs that block the passage through the Forest Thicket.

There’s a gang of Mercs who settled down not far away, in the Forest Thicket. I don’t need to tell you what a nuisance it is, it’s got to be resolved straight away. The Duty guys and some of the old-timers have already gone to teach them a lessons, but we haven’t heard from them in a while... So why don’t you... eh... go and check on them. The money's good, too.
Eliminate the bandits at the farmstead.
It's all simple: clear the farmstead of bandits.

There’s the farmstead in the Dead Swamp. Used to be a perfect place for a rendezvous, to exchange goods, you know... that sort of thing. But now the bandits have occupied it and, by the looks of it, they are not about to make off. Now, that doesn’t suit me at all. I need this farmstead asap. I don’t care what happens to the lodgers.
Purge the zombies at the Dead Swamps
Purge the zombies at the Dead Swamps
In the Dead Swamps, zombies keep robbing our couriers. We can't let these bastards do keep getting away with it. We have to clean up their camp.
Destroy the mutant lair in the Forest Thicket.
Destroy the mutant lair in the Forest Thicket.

A few of our guys went on an expedition, came back alone. All torn up, bloody, glassy eyes. Ran into dogs, most likely. There's a whole pack of them there. So, find their lair and kill every last one of them.
Destroy the group of bandits at the Agroprom.
Destroy the group of bandits at the Agroprom.

I remember how in '94 the racketeers latched on to me - cough it up, they said. Man, I went through hell then, I had a restaurant and all. Back then there was no case against them! And here I find out that the same gang's working in the Agroprom, making a profit off of the artifacts they find there. But here I can do something. I even know exactly where they're hiding. Do me a favor, punish them.
Destroy the lair of snorks in the Dark Valley
Destroy the lair of snorks in the Dark Valley

Yeah...It seems that the ones who say that the zone is expanding are right. They spotted a few snorks in the Dark Valley, but before they never saw them there. And here some started to panic. The Dutiers promised to destroy the snorks, but they can't seem to get around to doing it. Will you take it on?
Find the Meat chunk artifact
Find the Meat chunk artifact that heals ailments and injuries.

Some padres have stopped by, left an order for a Meat chunk. You know, they have a certain interest in this healing artifact... those rotten miracle-workers! Anyway... You gonna do it? It’s up to you.
Find the Crystal Thorn artifact
Find the Crystal Thorn artifact that protects against psi-attacks.

A "crone"?.. No, that’s not it. "Crystal corn"?.. No, wrong again... Bugger! "Crystal Thorn", that’s it! So here’s the deal: I have an order for this artifact, "Crystal Thorn". Have you heard of it? They say that if you’ve got one, no creature will be able to mess with your brain. So what do you say?
Find the Night Star artifact
Find the Night Star artifact to help the national military research effort.

I need the Night Star artifact. I'm sorry to say it doesn't grant any wishes, been there, done that, but it can make you wealthy. Scientists pay a lot for it. They say they make some military things out of it...So, are you up for it?
Find the artifact Flash
Find the artifact Flash
The assignment is simple and the pay is good. You have to find the artifact Flash. Don't even ask who ordered it and why. Well, will you do it?
Find artifact Goldfish
Find artifact Goldfish

Marked One, you know the story about the fairytale about the Goldfish? Yeah, yeah, that's the one. There are a bunch of jokes about it too. So anyway, there's this old man who keeps on wanting to catch it. Bottom line, I need the one-of-a-kind artifact called Goldfish, the client is from the outside, respectable. Will you help out?
Find psi-suit
Find the suit that provides efficient protection against psi-emissions. The place to look for it is the deserted labs in the Dark Valley.

In those labs in the Dark Valley, they were trying to find a way to protect human brains from psi-emissions. They were taking their time, that’s for sure... Anyway, one of their attempts actually was a success, and there’s supposed to be this suit somewhere that you can wear and even kiss the controller. Yep, it’s that good. So if you get me this doodah, I’ll never forget it.
Find the rare revolver.
Find the rare revolver in the Outskirts.
I once stashed a cool revolver in the Outskirts. I need it back. Will you bring it to me?
Find the L85 "Stormtrooper"
Find the L85 "Stormtrooper". Apparently, the place to look is in the Dead City.

There was this odd story. This one fellow pops up, pockets full of dough, and sets off hiring himself a gang, not the old-timers though, but more of the nippy type. Bought tons of gear... I had this one brand new L85 "Stormtrooper", a marvelous gun! - so I was fool enough to sell it to him. I won’t lie to you, I made quite a bit of money... except this whole crew got knocked out. What can I say, they died for nothing... well, a good lesson for all to learn: you can’t pave your way through the Zone with money. But anyway... I can't stop thinking about that L85, such a bang-up gun rusting somewhere! Won’t you find it for me? I’m paying good money!
Bring the anomalous shotgun
Find the anomalous shotgun in the Caves.
A stalker borrowed a modified shotgun from me went to the Caves. It was supposed to be returned, but it wasn't. I need that stalker found and the shotgun taken from him. Are you up for it?
Find the advanced machine gun
Find the advanced machine gun in Radar.

Monolitans often use German MG-42 machine guns. It's not clear where they get them from. Maybe the warehouse they found, or maybe they produce them themselves. They told me that there is one machine gun hidden in Radar with a telescopic sight. Do you have any idea what kind of weapon it is? We should steal it. There's a door with a code lock. Behind it, you should find the machine gun. Code: 7472. I gave you the coordinates.
Bring the modified shotgun
Bring the modified shotguns hidden near the Generators.

My ex-friend, well, the one who joined the Monolith, borrowed a shotgun from me. It was custom-made. He never gave it back. But he told me where he left it - near the Generators. I gave you the coordinates.
Kill the soldier
A soldier has to bite the dust. The job is a piece of cake, except... it’s weird that the target’s a man in uniform, and the customer really has his dander up.
I need you to take down this grunt... don't ask me who he is, what do I care! Just do it. So? Can I entrust you with it?
Kill the stalker
Do in one of the stalkers. Death to the cheater, that's the trader's revenge.

You know, there’s this type of men that you could never say a bad word about... you trust him as you trust yourself, right? You bank on him... But suddenly you find out that he is the vilest and meanest son of a bitch... So here’s the deal: there’s this one case that needs to get sorted. Do it, and I’ll take care of the rest.
Kill the stalker from the Monolith grouping
Find a bartender's former friend in the Cave Labyrinth and help him die.

I used to have a friend... hard to believe, eh? Ah! we came to the Zone together when none of this stuff was here... The things we used to do, the places we used to go to... oh well, we were young, didn’t give a damn about anything... But he could never get enough. He wanted to go to the center of the Zone and was talking me into it, but I refused, and did the right thing... We had a really bad row, and he left on his own... And now I hear someone saw him there... he’s with Monolith now. So the deal is, Marked One... As a friend, do this for me, find him and... well, don’t make him suffer, it must be bad enough... He was like a brother to me, you know?
Kill the stalker called Vampire
Find and kill the stalker called Vampire.

That's it, I’ve had enough of this scumbag! I mean Vampire; do you know him? That bastard! Sucking luck out of people instead of blood. Whoever goes with him, they all die, all to a man, but he always comes back safe and sound! Done it five times now! That’s evil, don’t you think? I’d love to put some flowers on this Vampire’s grave... So, do you take the job?
Kill the stalker called Sparrow
Find Sparrow and avenge the death of another stalker.

Damn musketeers! Playing D'Artagnan, assholes! As if surfing around anomalies and bowing to bullets is not enough, the oafs have now taken to fighting duels! Get this: there was this row... no one can even remember any more what started it. So these two dumbheads decided to shed some blood. And there you go, one dropped dead... a fine stalker he was, too! And the other one, Sparrow, beetled off, because I’d be the first one to put a bullet in his head. Find him. I’m sure he’s still in the Zone. Will you do it?
Obtain the flesh's eye
Obtain the flesh's eye

Soon we're having a party, there'll be a fancy dinner, and certain local gourmets who are in especially high spirits (we don't need to point fingers) will definitely want to try my special recipie - eyes of "flesh" under a pork sauce. That is, in its own juices under mayonnaise. Basically, I need the eye of that beast, and quickly.
Bring the hoof of a boar
Bring the hoof of a boar

Do you know that we prepare horns and hooves? This is a big rarity. They make great jewelry from the local mutated hooves - I know a jeweler, he's interested. So go on ahead, find the boar's hoof, and there'll be cash in your pocket.
Bring the dog's tail
Bring the dog's tail
Soon there will be foreign guests, who came to the Zone just to eat dog tails. Bring one and get a little bit richer.
Bring the hand of a pseudogiant.
Bring the hand of a pseudogiant.
An order has been received from a foreign scientific organization. They need the hand of a pseudo giant for research. They're paying well.
Protect the security post of the Duty
Protect the security post of the Duty at the Garbage.

So, you probably ran into our guys at the Garbage. They're there as a sort of an exterior post protecting the bar from mutants coming down from the dark valley. Information has come in that the sick herd of boar is approaching them. Help them fight off the mutants, and I'll owe you one.
Destroy the zombie
Destroy the zombie longlivers at Yantar.

Recently we sent a group to Yantar. Unfortunately, nobody from the group returned. I was informed that they saw a few zombied stalkers from the group not far from the mobile lab of the scientists at Yantar. We can't allow them to remain in that horrible state. Your assignment: find and destroy that, which they've become.
Eliminate a Freedom squad
Eliminate a Freedom squad near Jupiter.

We certainly don't place hits on other faction's stalkers. On the other hand, the task is simple, so there's no point in chasing our guys. All right, look. We need to clean up a small group of freedom fighters on Jupiter. We've got one group already over there, so in case of trouble, there's plenty of backup.
Destroy the stalkers' camp
Destroy the stalkers' camp at Agroprom

There's one delicate matter, but our guys definitely shouldn't be involved in it. The presence of neutrals on the factory at Agroprom isn't advantageous for our allies. Here's the assignment: free the promzone from the presence of stalkers, no matter who they are and what group they belong to. Understood?
Destroy the detachment of Mercs
Destroy the detachment of Mercs at the Rostok

So here's the assignment: you need to destroy the detachment of snipers of the mercs group. The situation: these snipers are holding the last floor of the building site complex. Assumed amout: not less than two, nor more than five. They're armed, judging by everything, with sniper rifles. Suggestion: don't show your face there during the day.
Protect the bandits' base
Protect the bandits' main base in the Dark Valley.

It is imperative to raid the bandits' main base and destroy the maximum amout of live strength of the enemy. That's in the Dark Valley, there where there's an unfinished science center. The enemy is numbering at thirty fighters; armed with light automatic weapons, guns, shotguns. Everything clear?
Eliminate the Freedom camp
Eliminate the Freedom Camp in Zaton.
This time you'll need to get to purging. You have to eliminate a camp of very dangerous anarchists in Zaton. All of them should be subjected to severe but fair punishment...
Destroy the herd of fleshes
Destroy the herd of fleshes in Garbage.

We tracked the migration of a large herd of beasts...Quite disgusting swine-like mutants whom everyone calls fleshes. Now they're in the area of the Garbage. All of our people are busy, but these beasts need to be destroyed. It's a special kind of job - we'll pay.
Destroy the pseudodogs
Purge the lair of pseudodogs by the military warehouses.

Our allies have notified us about the discovery of a lair of monsters on the territory by the military warehouses. We believe it's a pack of pseudodogs. We shouldn't be messing around in that area right now, so it's an assignment for a neutral. Are you in?
Destroy the security post of the Mercs
Destroy the mercenary base in the Industrial Zone.

Lately there's been an increase in the activity of groups of Mercs, there's been a few attacks on the scientists, researchers working in the zone. We can't leave that unpunished. We need to carry out a small punitive operation. The goal: a mercenary base in the Industrial Zone.
Destroy the Mercs in the Wild Territory
Destroy the Mercs in the Wild Territory
A group of scientists is planning to study the Wild Territory. But lately it hasn't been safe there, the Mercs have gotten activated. Make sure that there aren't any more Mercs in the Wild Territory.
Kill the freedom fighters
Kill the freedom fighters who got into Limansk.
I'll make this short. Freedom fighters got around our security posts and are now located in the Limansk. They need to be eliminated.
Destroy the controller
Destroy the controller at Yantar.
To carry out this assignment you need to have special skills. The scientists have reported to us that they noticed a controller at Yantar. Controllers are very dangerous, but I'm sure you'll manage.
Purge the Freedomers
Purge the Freedomers in the Red Forest.
A detachment of Freedom fighters was seen in Red Forest. Eliminate them. After carrying out this assignment, a special reward awaits you.
Destroy the bandits
Destroy the bandits at the Garbage.

The current situation is unfavorable, the bandits are gathering in the areas of the Garbage and the Dark Valley. The best solution is to carry out two preemptive strikes at the same time! Our fighters will take on the valley, and you'll get the Garbage.
Find the unique "Vintorez"
Find and deliver the unique "Vintorez" rifle

I lent my "Vintorez" to a stalker nicknamed Ghost. Yes, the one and only, legendary "Voronin's Vintorez". It seems that stalker died a brave death, but my rifle lies somewhere, waiting for a new owner... We need to find it.
Find the suit
Bring the new type of military suit.

Some of the military guys had new bulletproof vests. The inner padding of these things is soaked in some kind of healing ointment. Basically, wearing it causes shallow wounds to heal quicker. Recently, a dozen fighters with such suits moved to Yanter. Only six returned, with three more on their shoulders. Do you understand? There is one left. You can't let this vest fall into the hands of the enemy.
Find the modified shotgun
In the tech cemetery, find an improved Saiga-12 shotgun.

Monolithians captured my soldier in the tech cemetary. He had a very good Saiga-12 shotgun. Modified and adapted for sniper fire. He managed to escape from captivity, but he could not return the weapon, but he gave me the exact coordinates where to find it. Will you bring it back?
Neutralize the bandit
Neutralize the bandit Poker.

Subject's nickname - Poker. One of the most cruel bandits' leader, swine and rapist...Evidently his head is not okay: they say he caught a rare disease in the Zone. Now he suffers quite frequent lapses of memory, and when he gains consciousness, he can't remember who and where he is. Nevertheless, he's always armed and very aggressive. Ready for the task?
Find the weapon of the Dutyer.
The Dutyer is asking you to find his weapon, he lost it somewhere in the Dead Swamps during another scouting expedition.

Shouldn't have freaked out like that. How the zone messes with your head. Thought I had good nerves, never afraid of anything, and here this. This howling in the ears. Everything was going as usual. There was a scouting expedition to the Dead Swamps, we got down into the trench with Krivoi to cover the rest of the group, and then once I heard the howling, I was gripped by fear. Damn, I don't even remember how I got to the coordinate. When I returned to the base, Voronin almost shot me on the spot: he had just given me a modified rifle, as a reward for good service, so to speak. And here...I panicked and took off so fast that I left the gun there. Could you bring it back for me? Where else will I go now without a decent weapon...
Purge the lair of the snorks
Destroy the lair of the snorks at Yantar.

I want to offer you a small amout of money that you'll receive if the snorks living in the swamps will stop bothering me and my colleagues. Sometimes when we're carrying out our experiments, we can't even concentrate. Our guard cats aren't always up to the task of keeping them at bay.
Destroy the lair of chimeras
Purge the lair of chimeras in the "Heart of the Forest".

There's a chimeras' lair at the "Heart of the Forest", I want you to travel there and clean it up. These mutants are particularly dangerous for our expeditions. I now that zoologists won't favor this, but this is not a zoo here, I must admit. Such beasts spread rabies, plague or god knows what else.
Bring the Fireball artifact
Bring the Fireball artifact to the scientists for researches

We've managed to obtain the artifact in laboratory conditions! This is a breakthrough! Now all the world will hear about our success. And the Nobel Prize will be close at hand! This is the unique artifact - "Pellicle", it's main quality is to protect from the chemical burns. Do you want me to give it to you on behalf of science? However, I do have one request - in return I need the artifact "Fireball", do you know about such? Unique thermal qualities of its surface require thorough research.
Find the "Gravi" artifact
Bring the "Gravi" artifact to the hands of the scientists.

We've approached closely to the comprehension of the nature of gravitation, practically, soon enough we'll be able to create a new generation of engines on the antigravity basis, and quite probably the path to the stars will open to us. For that, we need "Gravi" artifact, and fast.
Find the "Jellyfish" artifact
The scientists need the "Jellyfish" artifact to carry out researches in the field of space-time.

Our research team is on the brink of discovering the mystery of space-time. The possibility of teleportation is no longer fantasy! The Vortex is an anomaly which squeezes space rather than just gravitationally affecting objects, as believe some of my ossified opponents-theorists, who sit in the warm research facility earnestly chewing chalk. Their glasses will fog up when they find out what results science can achieve when you work in the field! Please get me the artifact "Jellyfish".
Find the "Moonlight" artifact
Provide "Moonlight" to the scientists at Yantar. A good artifact...

We desperately need materials for continuing our research in the field of energetics. You see, we learned to generate energy with the help of artifacts. Granted, this works while the KPD isn't high enough. We were able to get the best results with the artifact Moonlight. Please bring us a sample for experiments.
Find the artifact called Sea Urchin
The scientists need the Sea Urchin artifact to improve their suits

You are probably aware of the fact that our suits provide the best defence against radiation. The secret lies in the fact that we saturate them with a lotion made out of quite a rare artifact. To manufacture another series of these suits we need such an artifact. You call it "Sea Urchin".
Bring the unique bodysuit
Bring the unusual bodysuit from the underground laboratory X16. Reward - flamethrower.

We have some business with you. Recently we hired a stalker to get into the laboratory. Even then I noticed his unusual bodysuit - it gave off noticeable heat. The stalker said that the bodysuit itself can heal wounds. Bottom line - the stalker didn't return from the lab. Oh no - don't even think it! We had nothing to do with it! And his bodysuit is most likely still there. I would be very glad to get it for research. In return, I will give you a flamethrower that I developed, which is very effective against mutants.
Bring a scientific calculator
Find Professor Sakharov's scientific calculator.

I am not young any more and am not used to these modern technologies. I prefer to make my calculations with the help of a particular calculator. But here's a problem - during one of my expeditions in the depths of the Zone, I left my favorite scientific calculator, and now I have no one to send for it. Come on, young man, will you bring me my calculator?
Bring a part of the snork's body
It's a piece of cake getting a fragment of a snork in these parts.

We got acquainted with Semenov back in the university where I was giving lectures on genetics, and he was my student. Thus I became his scientific chief. Back then, we were only slightly unveiling the curtain of mystery of genome modification. So what was I saying? Oh, right. For genetic experiments we will need the samples of fresh cells of the muscular tissue of snork. You will have to search the bogs for this genic material. There is a hypothesis that snorks as species are the new level of human's evolution. In order to know this for sure, DNA test must be procured!
Get a chimera's claw
Bring the claw of a chimera to the scientists. I hope they pay well; chimera hunting is a dangerous business.

Greetings, colleague! For our latest experiments aimed at developing super strong materials, we've come across the need for some chimera claws. Will you bring one to us? But be careful. This is a very dangerous predator.
Get a poltergeist's eye
Bring the eye of a poltergeist to the scientists. Just where could I find these poltergeists?
Greetings, colleague! I can't give you all the details, but it's extremely important for us to get the eye of a poltergeist. Are you up for it?
Bring the hand of a librarian
Bring the hand of a librarian. I wish I could say I shat my pants and ran away... But the money is good.

Good day! Some of my colleagues doubt the existence of this mutant, sometimes even I do myself. But here's your lucky day to prove us wrong. We need to get a part of the librarian's body. They say they are rare and very dangerous mutants, found in various secluded places. If you successfully do this, I am ready to pay a serious amount of cash.
Camp elimination
Find the item
Protect the stalkers at Agroprom
Fight off the bandits' attack of the stalkers' camp at Agroprom.

There's a group of stalkers, they live at the Agroprom. Average guys, they understand that the Zone is a place of freedom, that laws don't apply here and you just have to live right, based on your own morals. And now they're thinking about maybe joining us. Yeah, help them fight off the bandits? And we'll send you some ammo.
Protect border
Protect the border near the army warehouses from monsters.
Here come the monsters again from the side of the Scorcher. Help the guys at the border hold them off. I guarantee a reward.
Destroy a pack of zombies
Destroy a pack of zombies in Limansk.

Our detachments in Limansk have suffered serious losses from various types of zombies, which haven't been documented there. We need to help our guys to clean the city from these pests. Will you help them?
Destroy the Merc camp
Destroy the Merc camp by the warehouses.

Listen, here's the deal. The Merc camp needs to be destroyed. We could leave them be, they're good shots... except they've been really asking for it, sneaking into our territory, trying to bribe my people. It's time to teach them a lesson. Can you do it?
Destroy the Duty detachment
Destroy the clean-up Duty faction in Rostok.

How 'bout going on a hunt? Duty's clean-up detachment showed up at Rostok. This is a great chance to take them by surprise. Duty keeps sending guys hunting for the monsters, but in the process they don't hesitate to shoot whoever isn't up to their likening. This detachment needs to be finished off before Duty comes to Rostok. There shouldn't be too many people: three or four veterans and a couple of rookies.
Destroy the Duty outpost
Destroy the Duty outpost in the Swamps as soon as possible.

There's a very urgent job. The passage needs to be cleared of the Duty unit... We're expecting a very important package, but now it must not be ruled out that Duty already know about our courier and will try to waylay him. We need to wipe off this roadblock, even if for a little while. Ok?
Destroy the Duty outpost
Destroy "Dolga" roadblock in Garbage.

There's a very urgent job. The passage needs to be cleared of the Duty unit... We're expecting a very important package, but now it must not be ruled out that Duty already know about our courier and will try to waylay him. We need to wipe off this roadblock, even if for a little while. Ok?
Destroy the herd of boars
Destroy the herd of boars in the Forgotten Forest.

We always keep getting flocks of boars charging in from the Forgotten Forest. Now it's their mating season and they are really riled up. The job is simple: just go to the Forest and purge it from these creatures. You get what I mean?
Eliminate the Monolith outpost
Eliminate the Monolith outpost in Limansk.
In Limansk, Monolith fighters are constantly firing at our outposts and we keep losing a lot of men. We need someone to go there and take care of those bastards. Are you up for it?
Destroy the Duty squad
Destroy the Duty squad in Zaton.
A bunch of Duty guys are getting cocky in Zaton. We need someone to calm them down and show them their place. Will you do it?
Steal the sniper rifle
Steal the modified SVDm 2 from the Duty warehouse.

There is a special assignment. And pretty tough, too... So, you'll need to retrieve an improved Dragunov from the Duty warehouse. This piece even has a name of its own, but never mind. The main thing is that with its awesome scope and recoil canceller you can shoot a squirrel in its eye from 400 meters. So, I trust you'll do it!
Obtain the modified Chaser 13
Obtain the modified Chaser 13 from the scientists.

I hear the eggheads managed to improve the Chaser shotgun by using an artifact. The knockdown power of this thing is the same as a howitzer. So why don't you pay them a visit and see if you can make a bargain. I'll make up for all expenses!
Find the rare assault rifle
Get the rare variant of the M-16 assault rifle near the Army Warehouses.

I collect rare weapons. Quite recently I have seen a rare modification of the M-16 assault rifle carried by one of the mercs. Obviously, I want to get my hands on it. I am interested in such a rifle. I'll be grateful for it, no doubt.
Kill Duty's security chief
Kill Duty's security chief and try do it as quietly as possible.

It would be well for Duty's security chief to quietly disappear. And when they're in a deep mess, I'll be able to plant a few of my guys in their gang. And then, the devil can pull off any stunt... alright, I better shut up. I suggest you take care of him from a distance, without kicking up a fuss.
Kill Captain Ivantsov
Kill Captain Ivantsov, the closest aide of the Duty leader.

It's a tough job, I'm warning you right away, but it's worth it. Ivantsov, a close aide of the Duty leader, has been asking for it. He does the dirtiest jobs: punitive operations, raids... If you only knew how many of our guys he's killed off! It's high time we did away with this slimeball. So if you make up your mind to do it, I suggest you get yourself well armed.
Kill Colonel Petrenko
Kill Colonel Petrenko, one of the founders of the Duty faction.

Colonel Petrenko... I don't know if you've heard the name or met him, but it would be good for the two of you to meet. This man is one of the Duty founders and one of our worst enemies. Try to make sure your conversation ends as fast as possible... for him. Can you handle that?
Eliminate the trator
Find and eliminate the Freedom traitor.
One of ours decided to abandon us and instead went to the mercenaries. Before that, he apparently spied on them. Betraying your bros is unforgivable. Will you take him out? We'll pay, don't worry.
Kill one of the Duty commanders
Kill one of the Duty commanders
I'll pay for the head of any Duty leader! Knock one off and come back for reward.
Kill the stalker called Scarecrow.
Eliminate the stalker called Scarecrow

We eliminate monsters, except for us it's a matter of survival, not profit. Mutant populations are not as numerous; besides, they're living beings too, so we can't permit their annihilation. Some individuals refuse to understand it. An apt illustration is the stalker called Scarecrow. He got his nickname for a reason, selling stuffed mutants. We've warned him before, but all for nothing. So can you do a good deed for mother Earth?
Kill the stalker called Barin.
Kill the stalker called Barin, chief quartermaster of the Duty faction.

A cad, bootlicker, hypocrite and coward... that's stalker Barin for you. As you can see, a man with a marvellous character, which helped him get to the top of Duty. Currently supplies the faction with supplies and foodstuff, though he takes part in raids from time to time. We need to get rid of him, especially since all the clues regarding Duty logistics lead to Barin.
Bring the paw of a pseudogiant
Bring the paw of a pseudogiant
We have a festive dinner to celebrate the birthday of Bob Marley. Bro, it would be so totally cool if you'd get a paw of a pseudogiant! Or even better, two of them! Jah will never forget you!
Destroy the lair of the controller.
The hunter is asking to purge the lair of the Controller in the Collective Farm, and in return he promises a rare artifact.

Have you ever run into a Controller? Horrible thing, isn't it? Well the other day I went to the Collective Farm, thought I'd look for some artifacts. And imagine this: suddenly I see a Controller, with his bloated head and all... He's sitting over a corpse, doesn't see me. I freaked out and made a run for it. I shouldn't have started running though, because he heard me and went after me, and there was all this howling all around me and then I understood that he wasn't alone. I think they have a lair there. If you could chase them away from there, I would give you a rare artifact that I found a couple days ago.
Kill the stalker.
Get a part of a monster body.
Destroy the stalker from Freedom.
One stalker, a former dutyer, who had a lot of important information about objects at Pripyat, recently came over to the Freedom side. He needs to be killed before he says too much.

Listen here. We have maps of Pripyat - not up-to-date ones, but old ones, made in the early 90's. The most important thing on them is the marking of all military objects: underground warehouses, bomb shelters. Now there's little use from it, of course, but if we find a road to Pripyat, this information will become priceless. Here's the problem though. One of the officers went over to the Freedom side, and he knew about this information. Bottom line, he needs to be silenced before he says too much.
Come back for the reward.
Bring the customer what's been promised.
I can't offer anything at the moment.
And what do you want to talk about?
Great job, reward well deserved!
What's up?
Look what we've got now:
Look what we've got now:
I can't offer anything at the moment.
And what do you want to talk about?
Great job, here's your well deserved reward!
What's up?
Cover the Duty detachment from the attack of the bandits in the Dark Valley
Cover the Duty detachment from the attack of the bandits in the Dark Valley

I finally managed to get it into the thick heads of the dutyers that it's high time to purge the Garbage from bandits. The Duty will get to enlarge its territory and they won't damage my regular clients as often. Well, here's the deal - the leadership of the Duty decided, for starters, to cut off the flow of bandits from the Dark Valley. So they sent out a blockade detachment and discovered that the bandits didn't like that. Who would have thought! So what I'm wondering is, could you help them secure the entrance to the Valley? I'll thank you handsomely.
There are no jobs available right now.
What do you want to discuss?
Good boy! Job well done.
I'm listening.
Here's the job update:
For the moment there's nothing.
What assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
Sorry, but we don't have any jobs at the moment.
What is the job you would like to talk about?
You did a great job! Allow me to present you with your reward.
I'm listening.
Here's what I can offer:
Here's what I can offer:
Sorry, but we don't have any jobs at the moment.
What is the job you would like to talk about?
You did a great job! Allow me to present you with your reward.
I'm listening.
Here's what I can offer:
Sorry, but we don't have any jobs at the moment.
What is the job you would like to talk about?
Great! Here's your reward.
I'm listening.
Here's what I can offer:
Sorry, but we don't have any jobs at the moment.
What is the job you would like to talk about?
Great! Here's your reward.
I'm listening.
Destroy the bandit camp at the Garbage.
Eliminate the bandits at the Garbage who rob stalkers on the way back from the Zone. The trader will be happy.

The bandits have rallied lately, getting in the way of honest people trading... So make a beeline for the Garbage, I've been told these scumbags have settled down near the scrapyard. You look into this matter, and everyone will be grateful to you, and I'll be generous with the reward. Agreed?
Destroy the bandit camp at the ruined church.
Eliminate the bandits at the ruined church in the Swamps. Apparently, they're new to the Zone, so the job is gonna be easy.

The bandits have been hanging around the old church again. So did you guess already what the job is about? Well then... jump to it! Pass our warmest greetings to them and come back, I'll thank you then. Deal?
Eliminate the bandits by the Agroprom Research Institute.
Eliminate the bandits by the Agroprom Research Institute. Better stay on friendly terms with the trader.
Some bandits turned up by the Agroprom Research Institute. They're disturbing my diggers when they sort through the rubbish. You solve the problem, I'll owe you.
Purge the area from mutants.
Purge the area from mutants.

There is one thing, pretty easy. They want to bring some foreign tourist over. He paid some dough to my homies to get to look at the zone. And the area where they're gonna show him around needs to be cleared of mutants. Will you do it?
Eliminate two bandits at the Swamps.
Make the road to one of the best places in the Zone accessible to all.

Recently one of the best places in the Zone became inaccessible for lovers of the wonderful. At the Swamps...yeah, the Swamps, there's a quaint little place like nothing else, where all your sadness leaves you, where you forget about the dirt, about money, about blood. Forgot, that is, because now there are two dirty freaks sitting there, who threaten to kill anyone who doesn't pay them for being able to enter the place. Get rid of them - I have no other place to take the tourists.
Kill the bloodsucker in the Dark Valley
Kill the bloodsucker in the Dark Valley

They say that the troops left the Dark Valley. And then monsters started pouring out of every crevice. The stalkers already spotted a bloodsucker there, and an extraordinary one at that - he's not afraid of open spaces. Any way, once word gets around to the scientist, they'll definitely want to study this bloodsucker. And I want to be the person who hands them over the body. Your job is to kill the bloodsucker, and I'll take care of the rest.
Find the Jellyfish artifact
Find the Jellyfish artifact formed in the Springboard anomaly
Some guy from the Big Land asked for a Jellyfish. It's not a lot of money, but it's a milk run. Take it!
Find the Stone Flower artifact
Find the Stone Flower artifact formed in the Springboard anomaly. The pay is supposed to be pretty good.

I have a request for the Stone Flower. The order is from the jewellers, by the way, so let's try to make the pretty ladies happy, eh? If you get it, you'll get the money and a bottle to drink to their health...
Find the Night Star artifact
Find the Night Star, a rare and expensive artifact.

There is this one little job... rather unpleasant. Apparently, it's coming from the military, they're working on some new protection. Anyway, there's an order for the Night Star. It's quite a rare artifact, but it provides pretty good protection from bullets... So will you do it? I'll pay you well!
Find the artifact called Meat Chunk
Find the wound-healing artifact called Meat Chunk
There's an order for an artifact, the kind that heals wounds, called Meat Chunk! They have a clinic of some sort. If you get it you'll get paid and help people at the same time.
Bring Sidorovich's gun
Find and return Sidorovich's gun

I hid my gun here in a secluded place, but I am afraid that some curious stalker will find it there. It would be a shame, as the gun is very valuable... Well, at least for me. So, be kind, get there before him, and I will pay you. I'll give you the coordinates of the hiding place. Will you get it for me?
Find the modified submachine gun
There's a variant of the "MP5" submachine gun, which is rumored to have been converted to accept 7.62x25 mm cartridges. The last known owner was seen in Garbage.

Eh, and there's this stupid stupid trend of modded weapons... Already there is hardly anyone who wants to shoot from a regular gun, even the newbies! Alright, getting to the point... There is an order for an improved submachine gun. According to rumors, there is a stalker hanging around in Garbage with an MP5, which was modified to use 7.62x25mm cartridges. Will you get it for me?
Bring the modified assault rifle
Bring the improved assault rifle. It is located somewhere in the Outskirts.
An order for a modified rifle has been placed. Now we need an AKM with improved optics. The task is not very difficult, but the pay is decent. Will you take it?
There's no job right now, really...
So what is it that you want to discuss?
Here's a fine young man! Excellent job, here's your money.
What's up?
Here's what I've got:
For the moment there's nothing.
What assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
It's alright. Some other time.
I refuse to do this job.
I have completed this task.
Kill the bandit leader
Kill the bandit leader who crossed the trader. Most likely he won't be alone... Tough job, but the pay covers it all. The Garbage is the place to look for him.

You'll have to finish off this one dandy, one of the bandit leaders. The other day the bandits, by his order, intercepted my courier and shook him up and I don't waste words with those who touch my people... In a word, if you get it done, I'll return the favor. So are you up for it?
Kill the trader stalker
Kill a stalker... Well, that's not the best job, lifting a hand against a fellow worker. But the pay is pretty good, and this may be what matters the most.

I'm having a confrontation with this one trader. Well, if he doesn't want to cooperate, the hell with him! But I won't let anyone start filthy rumors. In short, he needs to be wasted so the others don't get out of hand. Let them all know who's the boss here...
Kill the rookie stalker

Finish off a rookie stalker, who may not be a rookie at all... Who then? The hell with them, though! The main thing is that the work is not dusty. Sidorovich warned me, that this murky novice could be a tricky little bugger and would probably hide.

There's this one guy here loafing about, pretending to be a rookie, but he's rather weird... If word gets out, that this "newcomer" is not who he says he is, then he may run and hide. But at the moment he isn't. Sooner or later, the poet's soul will not stand. So anyway, if he suddenly disappears, you'll be doing me a great favor. You know what I mean?
Kill the stalker called Fiend
Eliminate one of the trader Sidorovich's rivals, a stalker called Fiend.

The Fiend, aka Oleg Gusarov... used to serve in Spetsnaz. As long as he minded his own business, I had nothing against him, a loner is a loner. But I hear he's mustering a gang to crush down the cordon and take control over smuggling operations from the Zone. Now this is a major problem and it has to be solved quick. So will you do it?
Kill Father Diodor
To kill a man preaching in the Zone against gathering and selling artifacts? Exactly.

I always said business and religion can't go together, they can never cross, and should never ever meddle in the other's affairs! It's just this padre, Lord forgive me, Diodor... well... he just can't see this simple truth. He keeps raving about artifact hunting, says that trading in them drives people to sin not just in the Zone, but in the whole world, on and on along those lines. Get this, he preaches the destruction of artifacts altogether! See what he is up to? The worst bit is that he's actually got some converts! I've tried to approach this Diodor this way and other, but he just keeps at it. Here's the deal: you're going to send him upstairs where he can preach all he likes... you get the point, right? And I'll give you a cool artifact. So, we've got a deal?
Kill the "sales representative"
Kill the "sales representative". The trader is looking after his reputation

Imagine this: there's some weirdo running around here who introduces himself as my sales representative, uses my reputation, and then tries to hand off second-rate stuff! Broken barrells, the armor that's falling apart, expired canned goods. I've already had to deal with a few unhappy clients. Bottom line, I need a man to have a little chat with that "sales representative", whatever it takes.
For the moment there's nothing.
What assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
Nothing for the current moment.
What task do you want to talk about, boy?
Task complete... and here's the reward!
So what's with the task?
There is something:
Bring the jaw of the bloodsucker
So the tooth of the bloodsucker brings good luck? Let's see if it'll bring luck to the bloodsucker

I heard a superstition that the tooth of a bloodsucker brings good luck. As if the one who wears that tooth around his neck gets past the anomalies, and artifacts fall right into his hands. Anyway, it's all bullshit, but there are some dopes who believe it all and are ready to pay well for it. If you bring the jaw of a bloodsucker, I'll pay you well.
Bring over the tail of the pseudodog
Bring over the tail of the pseudodog

Winter's coming soon. And what do chicks like to wear there on the Big Land during winter? That's right - furs. So now there's a new fashion going around, making various accessories from the tails of pseudodogs. It's some sort of special fur! Bottom line, there's an order for such a tail. Will you take it?
Bring the eye of a Flesh
Bring the eye of a Flesh

We'll have a party soon and some local gourmets are very excited for it (let's not point any fingers)! They will certainly want to try a delicacy of my own creation: Flesh eyes with pork sauce. To be more specific, in their own juice, mixed with mayonnaise. I need the eye of this creature. Quickly!
Bring the hand of a Controller
Bring the hand of a Controller
We received an order from one foreign scientific organization. They need the hand of a controller for research. They'll pay well.
For the moment there's nothing.
Which assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
I'm here for the job.
I'm not interested in that kind of jobs.
Some other time.
I'm up for it.
I need a job. Do you have something for me?
For the moment there's nothing.
Which assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
There's no job right now.
What job do you want to talk about?
Job's done... and here's the reward!
What about the job?
Here's something:
Here's something:
There's no job right now.
What job do you want to talk about?
Job's done... and here's the reward!
What about the job?
For the moment there's nothing.
Which assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
For the moment there's nothing.
Which assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
Destroy the boar lair
The boars made a lair next to the place where Wolf and his friend made a storage. Wolf asks to purge the lair, and promised to handsomely reward you.

My friend and I had a storage here not far from the car park, where the forest is more dense. Basically, just what you need. But recently the boars made a lair there, and now we can't get to the storage. Help - kill the boars, and I'll thank you, for myself and for my friend.
Destroy the mutants at the farm
Wolf asks to purge the farm from mutants, wants to set up an outpost camp there.

Though this is the border of the Zone, newbies have it tough even here. The bandits are only half the problem - they at least understand Russian. But the mutants - it's really tough with them. They made themselves a lair at the abandoned farm, took over the only good place for an outpost camp. If you manage to purge the farm from the mutants, I'll owe you.
Find the improved suit.
Wolf told about a bandit stash, in which they hid the loot. He asked to bring the special suit hidden there, for a reward, of course.

Overheard the bandits talking about their hiding place, where they put their swag. They hid a cool jacket there and the next day some monster liked their hiding place. Actually, it liked it so much that now the bandits are afraid to go back there to get their swag. Bring me the suit, friend, and I will pay you back.
Camp defense
At the moment there's nothing.
Which task do you want to talk about?
Here is the reward
What about the task?
There is something:
Destroy the gang of bandits
Destroy a gang of bandits in Jupiter.
Our scouts report that a gang of bandits has been spotted in Jupiter, who regularly attack our troops. This gang needs to be eliminated.
Destroy a mercenary squad
Destroy a squad of mercenaries in Zaton.
Our garrisons in Zaton report that a detachment of mercenaries has been spotted there. We need to have it eliminated.
Destroy the Monolith garrison
Destroy the Monolith garrison in Jupiter.
Our squads in Jupiter report that a garrison of Monolith was spotted there. We need to have it cleared.
Exterminate the lair of zombies
Destroy a lair of Zombies in Zaton.
Our garrisons in Zaton report that local zombies prevent them from conducting special operations. It is imperative that they are destroyed.
Exterminate a flock of Fleshes
Exterminate a flock of Fleshes in the Hidden Valley.
Our garrisons in the Hidden Valley report that a flock of particularly aggressive fleshes has appeared over there. We need to have it purged.
Purge the lair of monsters
Destroy the lair of various monsters near the Cordon railway bridge
Patrolmen near the railway bridge have reported, that a lair of vermin has been spotted. It is imperative that it is purged.
Purge the boars' lair
Destroy a lair of boars in Cordon.

Got a simple job for you. Exterminate the boars nearby. They have become aggressive lately, and the patrols have been distracted by them time and again. A boar even managed to nick a soldiers leg... I'll mark their place on the map in your PDA. Should be easy to find.
Bring the new military suit.
Bring the new military suit.

Some of our Special Forces got new bulletproof vests. The inner padding of these things is impregnated with some healing ointment. Helps the wound heal faster. Recently, a dozen of our troops in such vests moved to Yantar. Only six returned, with a further three wounded... One got left behind. We must not let this vest fall into the hands of our enemies.
Bring the prototype armored suit
Bring the prototype army special armored SCAT-10 suit-exoskeleton.

Some of our Special Forces have new armored suits. Recently, a dozen of our men in such armored suits were sent to Eastern Pripyat. There, they attacked a large Monolith force. During the ensuing firefight, one soldier was wounded, and his comrades, so as not to drag the weight of the exoskeleton all the way back here, took it off and hid it in an secret place. We cannot let this armor suit fall into the hands of the enemy.
At the moment there's nothing.
Which task do you want to talk about?
Here is the reward
What about the task?
There is something:
Destroy the Barrier
Destroy the Barrier

Again, these infidels have organized an outpost in the territories of the Monolith. They say that they are defending themselves against us and they are constantly send their troops. Go and kill them all.
Destroy the camp at the Chernobyl NPP
Destroy the camp at the Chernobyl NPP.
We need to start regaining control of the Chernobyl NPP. Go there and destroy the camp that the military and its scientists have set up there.
Destroy the military base
Destroy the military base in Zaton.
The military have set up camp in Zaton. The Monolith has no need for such infidels. Destroy their camp!
Destroy the stalker base
Destroy the stalker base in Jupiter.
Stalkers have set up camp in Jupiter. The Monolith has no need for such infidels. Destroy their camp!
Destroy the mercenary base
Destroy the mercenary base in Zaton.
The mercenaries have set up camp in Zaton. The Monolith has no need for such infidels. Destroy their camp!
Destroy the bandit base
Destroy the bandit base in Zaton.
The bandits have set up camp in Zaton. The Monolith has no need for such infidels. Destroy their camp!
Destroy the drunkards and pests
Destroy the drunkards and pests in the Bar.
Drunks and pests have infested the territory of the Bar. The Monolith has no need for such infidels. Destroy them!
Destroy a flock of zombies in the Swamps
Destroy a flock of zombies in the Swamps
Hunters can no longer manage purging the mutant lairs, so they need help. A bunch of zombies has been found in the Swamps. Find them, and hunt down every last one of them.
Find the advanced suit
Find the advanced suit in the Swamps and bring it back to Sidorovich Jr.

I also sometimes organize raids in the Zone. Obviously, for this purpose, you need a suitable suit to protect you from mutant bites. I asked a guy to bring me a good jumpsuit, but that jerk hid it halfway in the Swamps and was afraid of something. Bring me this suit. Will you do it?
Find the video game
Find and bring Sidorovich Jr. the video game.

I once walked around here nearby and left my favorite video game near the place where I set up a camp. Go there and get it for me. I'll make sure you'll be awarded appropriately. This should be a cakewalk for you. All you need to do is just to fetch me this game.
Obtain a zombie's hand
Obtain a zombie's hand
We received an order from a foreign scientific organization. They need a zombie hand for research. They'll pay well.
Destroy the lair of the bloodsuckers in the Swamps.
Destroy the lair of the bloodsuckers in the Swamps.
We received an order from the hunters. They want somebody to clean up a farm in the Swamps from bloodsuckers.
Find the improved suit
Get the improved suit for Barkeep from the Outskirts
I once hid a suit by myself. One of those freedom suits, but it was modified. Now I need it back. If you'll run over there to the stash and bring it to me, I will gladly pay you back. Will you do it?
Find the improved AK-74N
Bring the improved AK-74N to the Barkeep from the Outskirts
I hid my AK-74N once in a secluded place in the Catacombs. Now I need it back. If you run over there and bring it back, I will gladly pay you. Will you do it?
Obtain an izlom's arm
Obtain an izlom's arm
We received an order from a foreign scientific organization. They need an Izlom's arm for research. They'll pay well.
Exterminate the chimera's lair
Exterminate the chimera's lair in Jupiter.

There is a chimera lair nearby, I want you to go and purge it. These mutants are dangerous for our expeditions. I know, zoologists will be pissed to hear about this, but this here is not a zoo. They already killed three of my employees.
Destroy the zombie lair
Destroy the zombie lair in Jupiter.
Nearby there is a zombie den, which must be exterminated. These walking husks are dangerous for our expeditions, because they through our protective suits and tansmit unknown diseases.
Eliminate the bandit camp
Eliminate the bandit camp in Jupiter.
Bandits set up camp nearby. We need it gone. They'll mug and shoot our expeditions, maybe even damage our protective suits!
Eliminate the monolith squad
Eliminate the monolith squad in Jupiter.
A detachment of Monolitans is stationed nearby, which must be taken care of at once! They keep shooting my employees.
Destroy the mercenary group
Destroy the mercenary group in Jupiter.
My colleagues discovered a group of mercenaries nearby, who regularly attack scientists and take away their research. We have to stop them!
Purge the flesh flock
Purge the flesh flock in Jupiter.

A flesh lair is nearby, which needs to be exterminated. These creatures are dangerous for our expeditions, because they can pierce our protective suits with their sharp apendages and transmit unknown deadly diseases.
Exterminate the snork lair
Exterminate the snork lair in Jupiter
Nearby there is a den of snorkels, which must be cleaned. These creatures are dangerous for our expeditions, because they can stomp my colleagues to death and transmit unknown deadly diseases.
Find the modified PB
Find and deliver the modified PB to Professor Zhupikov.
I research the weapons found in the Zone during my spare time. One of the local gunsmiths is said to have modified the PB pistol. I would like to take a look at this weapon.
Find a modified Beretta
Find and deliver a modified Beretta to Professor Zhupikov.
I research the weapons found in the Zone during my spare time. One of the local gunsmiths is said to have modified the Beretta. I would like to take a look at this weapon.
Find a modified Colt
Find and deliver a modified Colt to Professor Zhupikov.
I research the weapons found in the Zone during my spare time. One of the local gunsmiths is said to have modified the Colt. I would like to take a look at this weapon.
Obtain a splinter's leg
Getting a splinter's leg in this place is not a problem.
These very peculiar creatures called "Splinters" are found in this particular area of the Zone. We want to uncover the mystery of their origin, but for this we need a fragment of their body.
Obtain a Tushkano's head
Bring the head of the Tushkano to the scientists. Ew, what a disgusting creature...

Greetings, friend! In order to study the brain of mammals, we need to study the brain of local tushkanos, which posess an amazing intelligence. We would be very grateful if you could help us with this.
Obtain a cockroach's belly
Bring the cockroach's belly to the scientists.
We are interested in researching how cockroaches in the Zone can reach such huge sizes. We can only advance our knowledge, if you bring us a cockroach's belly.
Obtain the hand of a ghoul
Bring the hand of a ghoul to the scientists.
We are interesting in researching what kind of mammals do ghouls belong to. We can only advance our knowledge, if you bring us a ghoul's hand.
Obtain a ratwolf's tail.
Bring the ratwolf's tail to the scientists.
We are interested to know how rats could have been subjected to such mutations. We can only advance our knowledge, if you bring us a ratwolf's tail.
Exterminate the chimera lair.
Exterminate the chimera lai at the sawmill.
Tourists complain that they can't walk here safely, because of a herd of chimeras at the sawmill. We need to deal with these chimeras so our visitors wouldn't be scared away.
Destroy the zombie lair
Destroy the zombie lair at the ATP
Tourists complain that they can't walk here safely, because of a horde of zombies. We need to deal with the undead, so our visitors wouldn't get scared away.
Destroy boar's lair
Destroy the boar's den in the Izumrudnoye village in Zaton.
Tourists complain that they can't walk here safely because of the herd of boars. We need to deal with them, so that our visitors wouldn't be scared away.
Destroy the bandit camp
Destroy the bandit camp in Zaton.
Tourists complain that they can't walk here safely because of a gang of bandits. We need to deal with these thugs, so that our visitors don't get robbed.
Destroy the merc camp
Destroy the bandit camp in Zaton.
Tourists complain that they can't get through here safely because of a detachment of mercenaries. We need to deal with these mercenaries, so our visitors won't get shot.
Destroy the burglar camp
Destroy the burglar camp in Zaton.
Tourists constantly complain that they can't walk here safely because of a gang of robbers. We need to deal with these scumbags and keep our visitors safe.
Destroy the legionnaire's camp
Destroy the legionnaire's camp in Zaton.
Tourists complain that they can't get through here safely, because of a detachment of legionaries. We need to deal with them, so our visitors wouldn't get shot at.
Destroy the bandit camp
Destroy the bandit camp in the Abandoned Village.
Stalkers complain that they cannot walk here safely because of the bandits, who have settled in the village. We need to deal with these thugs and restore the order here.
Eliminate the Controller
Purge the Controller's lair in the store.
The controller had recently started to live here in the ruined store. This bastard must be dealt with, so that the stalkers wouldn't end up losing their minds here.
Destroy the boars' lair
The boar's lair in the Forest Thicket needs to be culled.
The boars in the Forest Thicket have gone completely crazy. They keep attacking stalkers in broad daylight. We need to have their numbers reduced somehow.
Destroy the flesh's lair
The flesh's lair in the Forest Thicket needs to be culled.
The fleshes in the Forest Thicket have gone completely crazy. They keep attacking stalkers in broad daylight. We need to have their numbers reduced somehow.
Destroy the mercenaries preparing to ambush
Destroy the mercenaries preparing an ambush in the Forest Thicket.

Stalkers complain that they can't get through here safely, because of the mercenaries who keep ambushing them in the forest. We need to have these grunts dealt with, so that the passing stalkers wouldn't end up with a bullet between their eyes.
Kill the traitor
Beard asks to kill a stalker, who disappeared with very rare artifacts.

I recently went with astalker to get some artifacts. We searched near the Scorcher. We found a lot of things, even found a couple of artifacts, which we never seen before, even in pictures. Later, this son of a bitch set me up. While we slept on our last night together, he stashed the most expensive artifacts somewhere. He lied to me; said they had disappeared. But a couple of days ago, I saw one of those rare artifacts at Barkeep. And then and there I knew... Well, if you can't find the artifacts, at least say hello to him from me, by filling him with lead. Or maybe you will find out where his stash is and you'll find the second artifact. It is worth it, believe me.
Kill a former school friend
Beard asked to kill a former school friend who joined the Monolith.

I had a good school friend, was even my best friend at some point. And then I learned that he had joined the Monolith and had become their leader. In memory of our old friendship I cannot let him suffer, because life of a brainless Monolith goon is pure suffering. Please put him out of his misery.
Find a rare machine gun
Beard asked to find a rare L86 LSW machine gun.

Recently, I've been rummaging around by the tunnels and found a place for a good stash. I really liked it and decided to leave my L86 LSW machine gun there. But then I came back later to retrieve it. I went into the tunnel, and a controller stood right next to the stash. Anyway, you should go there to get my machine gun... You bring it back and I'll owe you one.
Bring a funny magazine
Beard asks to bring an eye-catching magazine.

It's a little boring to be stuck here alone. I usually spend my time reading interesting literature. Some of our guys in Limansk had this one funny magazine. I think they don't need it anymore. You should get it for me. If you bring it to me, I will give you a cool revolver.
Kill the evil stalker
For the murder of every evil stalker, Ksyusha is ready to pay well. The fewer such stalkers, the more fun the girl is.

I am not interested in stalkers roaming the Zone, who use my girlish naiveness. This only makes my life harder and sadder. The fewer such people are, the happier I get. If you kill one of them, you will get a reward.
Kill the bastard stalker
For the murder of every bastard stalker, Ksyusha is ready to pay well. The fewer such stalkers, the more fun the girl is.

I am not interested in stalkers roaming the Zone, who use my girlish naiveness. This only makes my life harder and sadder. The fewer such people are, the happier I get. If you kill one of them, you will get a reward.
Exterminate the flesh lair
A herd of flesh settled in the Hidden Valley. Ksyusha asked to clear their lair and promised a reward for it.
You know, I am afraid of these local pigs. They give me the creeps. Anyway, could you kill them all for fuck's sake? I'll thank you back. Okay?
Exterminate the boar lair
A herd of boars settled in the Hidden Valley. Ksyusha asked to clear their lair and promised a reward for it.
You know, I am afraid of these local boars. They give me the creeps. Anyway, could you kill them all for fuck's sake? I'll thank you back. Okay?
Find a rare submachine gun
Ksyusha asks to find a rare UMP9 submachine gun.

One asshole, taking advantage of my naiveness, stole my cool gun. A German guy gave it to me as a gift for, let's say, an old friendship. Do what you want, but bring me this gun. Bring it to me and I'll give something to you.
Find a modified assault rifle
Ksyusha asks to find a modified assault rifle.

So there was this one stalker. He came up to me and said: "Ksyusha, do you want to have this 'Ksyusha' ". I'm like: "Come on, cut the bullshit". And he's like: "No no, let's go to the lake first, let's sit there for a bit, listen to cats meow". Do you take me for a fool, that would go to that lake straight away just to listen to some cats meow? Well, I divorced him like the last sucker I was with and then he played dumb, asked what the "lake" and what this "Ksyusha" were. He is a real dork, so he probably left this gun there in the hope that I would go there to listen to those cats. Here is the mark on your map, go and check it out.
Get an eye of a flesh
Be careful around those eggheads! Just in case.. But so be it, I'll get the eye of a flesh for them.

Good news, young man! We have a very interesting task for you! I think you, as a Homo Sapiens, with a mind just a tiny bit bigger than the common chimpanzees, will appreciate all the new revolutionary ideas of my colleagues. Our research has shown, that the eyes of the creatures commonly called "Flesh", contain, in simple words, - are you even listening to me? - olfactory receptors! Thus, they not only see with their eyes, but also smell with them! We are preparing for the operation to transplant this miracle eye to one of the... volunteer assistants. I think we are going to have a real breakthrough! But we need an organ donor, you see. Will you help us find one?
Get a boar's hoof
Bring a piece of boar to the scientists. A hoof should be enough.

Greetings... uh... traveler! I'm glad you decided to visit us. We need someone to participate in a very important experiment. Our colleague Zhupikov wants to try to prepare something edible from the local fauna for a practical experiment to study the effect of the mutated proteins on the human organs. So far, we have decided to try boar meat. We need some of their meat. A boar leg, for example. I hope you are able to understand this at least? If you go out looking, please, choose a more nutritious individual.
Get a wolf's tail
Get a wolf's tail for the scientists' sick experiments.

Greetings, colleague! We still cannot understand the remarkable properties observed in wolves, so we decided to change the approach of our studies. This time, we will start with their rear... Why are you smiling? That you're so... Ah, yes. I think I understand. You see, funny young man, we need the tail of this creature from... yes, from their rear. This was not about the reproductive organs of this mammal! Though you may need to harvest those next time.
Get a jaw of a bloodsucker
What they are going to do with the jaw of the bloodsucker - I do not care. I care how much they will pay for this rarity.

Oh, stalker, good to see you! Listen to me... You've already encountered bloodsuckers on your travels, right? If not, then it's your lucky chance! Science requires sacrifice. And that would mean you meeting bloodsuckers, of course. As soon as you can, bring us the lower jaw of a one of this specimen, with the whole, so to say, dangly bits intact. Unfortunately, I cannot share the details of the experiment with you... it may have a negative impact on the stability of your already traumatized psyche. We will be waiting.
Get a splinter's leg
Bring a splinter's fragment to the scientists.

Hello, friend! To explore the properties of the local flora and fauna, we need to study the local splinters, which possess amazing intelligence. We would be very grateful if you could help us with this.
Get a controller's hand
Bring a hand of a controller to the scientists. This will not be easy...

Greetings, colleague! To explore the vast field of telepathy, we need the hand of the co... Cotroller! You may have already encountered one of such monsters. The task is not easy, but it is extremely important for the future of mankind!
Get a hand of a pseudogiant
Bring the hand of a pseudogiant to scientists. Those eggheads went completely crazy!

Greetings, colleague! Again, I can't tell you all the details, especially since your feeble mind is still unable to comprehend them, but our experiments require the limb of this rare mutant. We will thank you if you help us.
Destroy the horde of monsters
Destroy the horde of monsters in the Collective Farm.

Greetings, colleague! A horde of various monsters have come to the Collective Farm. They are constantly trying to bite my other colleagues. We need to teach this horde a good lesson. We will thank you if you help.
Destroy the pseudogiants
Destroy the pseudogiants in the Collective Farm.

Greetings, colleague! Big animals with two paws and two small ones, simmilar to the Tyrannosaurus Rex, have come to the Collective Farm. They are constantly trying to eat my colleagues. We need to teach these pseudo-t.rexes a good lesson. We will thank you for your help.
Purge the monster lair
Purge the monster lair at the Collective Farm.
Greetings, colleague! There's a monster here which keeps sucking the blood out of my other colleagues. We need to teach it a lesson. We will thank you if you help.
Destroy the band of robbers
Destroy the band of robbers at the Collective Farm.
Greetings, colleague! A bunch of robbers are constantly trying to kill my other colleagues. We need to teach them a lesson. We will thank you if you help.
Purge the chimera lair
Purge the chimera lair at the Collective Farm.
Greetings, colleague! Some chimeras came to the Collective Farm recently and my other colleagues are very scared of them. We need to teach them a lesson. We will thank you if you help.
Destroy the herd of boars
Destroy the herd of boars at the Collective Farm.
Greetings, colleague! There is a herd of boars in the Collective Farm, which are constantly trying to catch my other colleagues. We need to teach this herd a lesson. We will thank you if you help.
Purge the bloodsucker lair
Bloodsuckers have settled in the Red Forest. The Forester has offered a reward if I purged their lair.
Despite all my efforts, some monsters still break through from the Forgotten Forest. Yes, you probably saw the bloodsuckers yourself when you came here. If you kill them, you will get a reward.
Purge the pseudogiant lair
Pseudogiants have settled in the Red Forest. The Forester has offered a reward if I purged their lair.

Oh this damned group keeps bothering me... No matter how I go around, the earth under my feet keeps trembling as if there is an earthquake. If you kill the pseudogiants causing this, you will get a reward.
Purge the chimera lair
Snorks have settled in the Industrial Zone. The Forester has offered a reward if I purged their lair.
The Industrial Zone is not far from here and I heard that there were some chimeras there. They might decide to move here. If you destroy them, I'll reward you.
Purge the snork lair
Snorks have settled near the Generators. The Forester has offered a reward if I purged their lair.
The Generators are not far from here and I heard that there were some snorks there. They might decide to move here. If you destroy them, I'll reward you.
Destroy the rookie camp
Destroy the rookie camp in Cordon.
There is a convenient place for the newly deployed squads of mercenaries in Cordon. However, this particular group is causing trouble. If you take care of them, I'll give you a reward.
Find the precious assault rifle
The forester asked me to find a valuable assault rifle.

I served as a border guard in my youth. Yes, but it was work nonetheless. At that time, the most courageous frontier guards were awarded with special AK-74s. And I, as the bravest of the brave, who detained and neutralized a foreign saboteur group by myself, was awarded with such an assault rifle. And since then I have been watching over it as if it were my own child. But one day, I went on a walk in the Dark Hollow, and took this rifle with me for some reason. But I had collected a lot of mutant parts at the time, so I hid it there. Only, I am afraid that someone will find it. It will be a pity - it is already a relic. Fetch it for me, will you? I will give you some valuable ammunition in return.
